## Description

Price Wars data set gathered by AGJ.

## Packages + Data

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gsheet)
library(vembedr)
library(gridExtra)
library("htmltools")
df <- gsheet2tbl('https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_6RZ0HXg7VbgO78oyFfUyZaFOUHYWijy8XH1_jw5tA4')
```

## Filtering for Specific Rows

Here we would only want to look at a specific row number (for example)

```{r}
df$Coles > 10
```
